content:
Hi Dr. Grove,

Thank you for taking the time to review my message. I wanted to follow up and request some clarification on your qualifications. At Televero Health, we are specifically looking for psychiatrists and Licensed Clinical Social Workers (LCSWs) to join our team.

Could you please confirm if you hold either of these qualifications? If so, I would be more than happy to discuss the counseling and psychiatric opportunities available at Televero Health. You can schedule a time that works best for you using my Calendly link: <https://calendly.com/bailey-baker-1/30min>

If you do not hold these qualifications but know of any colleagues who do and might be interested in such opportunities, I would greatly appreciate any referrals.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Bailey
